column3: Latest;PHNOM PENH: The Ministry of Health announcement on April 16 said there have been no new cases of COVID-19 discovered (4th day in a row). 98 people have now made full recoveries.------24 people are still being treated.------The recovered patients are an 80-year-old French man who was first placed in a Sihanoukville hotel and later admitted to the Khmer-Soviet Friendship Hospital and a 61-year-old French man who was living in Phnom Penhâ€™s Tuol Tumpoung district.------122 cases have been detected since the outbreak began. There have been no recorded deaths.
